title: The Runaway Kite 2
body:
C#m E A B

In a grey world where we belong

You were standing right next to me
     C#m         E         A        B
In a different place with many trees

On the beachside hand in hand

As fast as I can I run from here

Any time of the year

bodyLyrics:
I remember you were a stranger once
In a grey world where we belong
You were standing right next to me
In a different place with many trees

She changed my world with the blink of an eye
That is something I can't deny
Baby, baby
We live in a grey world


On the beachside hand in hand
As fast as I can I run from here
Any time of the year
